text: 8.10 Sek 8.8, Hib 10.16 Yad Bɨawl nɨbi ak, yad takaw anɨb agebin agup agɨl tɨkak. Kɨdek ñɨn ak, yad Yislel binɨb okok ayɨp takaw ag adek nokom lɨnɨgayn agup agɨl tɨkak. Pen takaw anɨb ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb agup agɨl tɨkak. Takaw yad apin ak, yad dɨl gos tɨmud kɨlop lɨl, gos kɨli nab ayaŋ kɨl tɨkɨnɨgayn agup agɨl tɨkak. Pen yad God kɨli yenɨgayn, kɨli binɨb yad yenɨgabal agup agɨl tɨkak.
